description: Helper for building and broadcasting Hive Engine custom_json transactions using Beem (Python).
usage:
from beem_transaction import send_hive_engine_tx
send_hive_engine_tx(
    username='youraccount',
    posting_key='your_posting_key',
    contract_name='tokens',
    contract_action='transfer',
    contract_payload={
        'symbol': 'PEK',
        'to': 'recipient',
        'quantity': '1.000',
        'memo': 'Test'
    }
)
